H0.text: Metals and nonmetals form ionic bonds.

H1.text: Metals and carbonates form ionic bonds.

H2.text: Metals and freshwaters form ionic bonds.

H3.text: Metals and organisms form ionic bonds.

A4.text: Atoms that lose electrons make positively charged ions (called cations). Atoms that gain electrons make negatively charged ions (called anions).

A5.text: Ionic bonding will occur only if the overall energy change for the reaction is favorable.
